alert.note: Alert for Coles; Cumberland; Effingham; Jasper; Shelby (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 8:17PM CDT until August 06 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN COLES...NORTHWESTERN JASPER...SOUTHEASTERN SHELBY... CUMBERLAND AND EFFINGHAM COUNTIES... At 816 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lerna to near Neoga to near Altamont, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mattoon, Effingham, Toledo, Altamont, Neoga, Teutopolis, Greenup, Watson, Stewardson, Dieterich, Beecher City, Lerna, Jewett, Shumway, Montrose, Janesville, Paradise, Woodbury, Moccasin and Sigel. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 150 and 187. Interstate 70 between mile markers 83 and 120. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central, central, southeastern and east central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Lincoln.
